## Load useful libraries
```{r}
library(plotly)
library(nnet)
```


## Pre-COVID  

```{r}
# Read the pre-covid data
precovid.df <- read.csv("Z:/precovid_final.csv")

# Combine self rated health classes into (1) excellent/good, (2) fair, (3) poor, (4) could not/would not respond
precovid.df$self_rated_health <- factor(precovid.df$self_rated_health, levels=c("Excellent", "Good", "Fair", "Poor", "Could not (would not) respond"))
levels(precovid.df$self_rated_health) <- c("Excellent/good", "Excellent/good", "Fair", "Poor", "Could not (would not) respond")

# Softmax regression to classify self rated health using ethnicity groups
precovid.multinom <- multinom(self_rated_health ~ as.factor(Ethnicity_adjusted), data=precovid.df)
summary(precovid.multinom)
```
